description: This Dart file defines the AuthProvider class, which manages authentication state within a Flutter application. It provides a 'login' method to interact with AuthService for user login, and notifies listeners about state changes such as loading and error states.

classes.name: AuthProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages authentication-related state, including login process, loading status, and error messages.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Asynchronously attempts to log in a user with the provided email and password, updating loading and error states accordingly.
